channel.title: CVE Feed for Huawei Technologies Co., Ltd. -- DP300,TE60,TP3106,eSpace U1981
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Huawei Technologies Co., Ltd. -- DP300,TE60,TP3106,eSpace U1981

item.title: CVE-2017-15342|2024-08-05T19:50:16.470Z -- huawei%20technologies%20co.%2C%20ltd. -- dp300%2Cte60%2Ctp3106%2Cespace%20u1981
item.description: Huawei DP300 V500R002C00, TE60 V600R006C00, TP3106 V100R002C00, eSpace U1981 V200R003C30SPC100 have a denial of service vulnerability. The software does not correctly calculate the rest size in a buffer when handling SSL connections. A remote unauthenticated attacker could send a lot of crafted SSL messages to the device, successful exploit could cause no space in the buffer and then denial of service.
